Title: Add items before login then login and check cart
Preconditions:
1. Open https://www.demoblaze.com/
User not logged in
Steps:
2. Add 2 items to cart
3. Log in
4. Check cart
Test Data:
username=guest_user2025
password=1
item= Nexus 6, Nokia lumia 1520
Expected result: Items added as guest should remain in cart after login
Actual Result: Cart is empty, and items disappeared.

Title: Add items before login, then login and add more, then logout
Preconditions:
1. Open https://www.demoblaze.com/
User has account, logged out
Steps:
2. Add 2 items as guest
3. Log in and add 2 more items
4. Log out
5. Check cart
Test Data:
username=guest_user2025
password=1
item= Nexus 6, Nokia lumia 1520
Expected result: Cart behavior after logout follows system design (empty / persistent)
Actual Result: After log out, cart only has the items were added before log in.

Title: Guest cart after refresh
Preconditions:
1. Open https://www.demoblaze.com/
User not logged in
Steps:
2. Add 2 items as guest and refresh page
3. Open cart
Expected result: Items remain after refresh
Actual Result: Items remain after refresh

Title: Logged-in cart after refresh
Steps:
3. Add 2 items and Refresh page
4. Open cart
Test Data:
username=guest_user2025
password=1
item= Nexus 6, Nokia lumia 1520
Expected result: Items remain after refresh
Actual Result: Items remain after refresh

Title: Logged-in cart after logout/login
Steps:
3. Add 2 items
4. Log out
5. Log in again
6. Open cart
Test Data:
username=guest_user2025
password=1
item= Nexus 6, Nokia lumia 1520
Expected result: Items still in cart
Actual Result: Items still in cart

Title: Guest cart after clearing cookies
Preconditions:
1. Open https://www.demoblaze.com/
User not logged in
Steps:
2. Add 2 items as guest and go to cart page
3. Clear cookies/cache
4. Refresh page
Expected result: Cart becomes empty
Actual Result: Cart contains so many items that weren't chosen previously, including repeated items with a total $163180

Title: Cart sync across devices
Preconditions:
1. Open https://www.demoblaze.com/
Account exists but not logged in
Steps:
2. Log in on Device A
3. Add 2 items
4. Log in on Device B
5. Open cart
Test Data:
username=guest_user2025
password=1
item= Nexus 6, Nokia lumia 1520
Expected result: Cart synced on both devices
Actual Result: Cart synced on both devices

Title: Guest → sign up → logout → login again
Steps:
2. Add 2 items as guest
3. Sign up and log in
4. Log out
5. Log in again
6. Check cart
Test Data:
username=guest_user2025
password=1
item= Nexus 6, Nokia lumia 1520
Expected result: Items persist after re-login
Actual Result: Cart is empty, and items disappeared.

Title: Cart sync across tabs when adding item
Steps: 2. In Tab 1 add item to cart 3. In Tab 2 open cart
Expected result: Item added in Tab 1 should appear in Tab 2 cart
Actual Result: Item appeared successfully in tab 2 cart

Title: Cart sync across tabs when removing item
Preconditions: 1. Open https://www.demoblaze.com/ User logged in and cart has at least 1 item
Steps: 2. In Tab 1 remove item from cart 3. In Tab 2 open cart
Expected result: Item removed in Tab 1 should also disappear from Tab 2 cart
Actual Result: Item removed successfully

Title: Logout in one tab ends session in another
Preconditions: 1. Open https://www.demoblaze.com/ User logged in in 2 tabs
Steps: 2. In Tab 1 log out 3. In Tab 2 try to open cart
Expected result: User should also be logged out in Tab 2
Actual Result: Tab 2 logged out successfully

Title: Logging in one tab reflects in another
Preconditions: 1. Open https://www.demoblaze.com/ User not logged in in both tabs
Steps:
2. In Tab 1 log in 
3. In Tab 2 open cart
Expected result: Tab 2 should recognize user as logged in
Actual Result: Tab 2 recognizes user as logged in and opens the right Cart

Title: Session persistence with multiple tabs refresh
Preconditions: 1. Open https://www.demoblaze.com/ User logged in in multiple tabs
Steps:
2. Add item in Tab 1 
3. Refresh Tab 2 and open cart
Expected result: Cart contents remain consistent across refreshed tabs
Actual Result: Cart contents remain consistent across refreshed tabs

Title: Cart item deletion after logout in multi-tab session
Preconditions: 1. Open https://www.demoblaze.com/ User logged in in multiple tabs
Steps:
2. Add item in Tab 1 
2.1 Goto Cart page
3. log out from Tab 2
4. remove item from Tab 1
5. log in again
6. Goto Cart page
Expected result: Cart page will show the item undeleted, because it was deleted after logging out
Actual Result: Cart is empty and item was deleted, although the session was supposed to expire

Title: Homepage responsiveness on different screen sizes
Steps: 1. Open https://www.demoblaze.com on desktop browser.2. Resize window to tablet-like dimensions.3. Resize window to mobile-like dimensions.4. Observe layout and components.
Expected result: Layout adapts to screen size (menu collapses, images resize, no overlapping).
Actual Result:
-The header layout isn't adaptable with tablet and mobile sizes.
-The slideshow below header doesn't appear when wedth is lower than 800px

Title: Navigation menu usability on mobile
Preconditions: User not logged in, mobile view
Steps: 1. Open https://www.demoblaze.com on mobile.2. Click the categories menu.3. Navigate to different categories.
Expected result: All items should be accessible without overlap or cut-off.
Actual Result: All items appear and are accessible

Title: Product grid alignment across devices
Steps: 1. Open homepage on desktop.2. Observe product grid layout.3. Switch to tablet and mobile views.4. Check product alignment.
Expected result: Products display consistently without broken alignment or hidden items.
Actual Result: Products display consistently without broken alignment or hidden items.

Title: Image scaling and clarity
Steps: 1. Open product page (Nexus 6).2. View image on desktop.3. Resize to tablet and mobile.4. Zoom in/out.
Expected result: Images scale properly, remain clear, no distortion or cropping.
Actual Result: Images scale properly, remain clear, no distortion or cropping.

Title: Button and link accessibility (tap targets)
Preconditions: User not logged in, mobile view
Steps: 1. Open homepage on mobile.2. Try clicking Add to Cart, Login, Sign up.3. Check spacing and tap area size.
Expected result: Buttons and links are easy to tap, not too small or too close together.
Actual Result:
-Buttons and links like login and sign up don't appear well to normal user
-After clicking add to cart the top menu doesn't appear properly

Title: Checkout form responsiveness
Steps: 1. Log in.2. Add item to cart.3. Proceed to checkout page on desktop.4. Resize window to mobile.5. Fill form fields.
Expected result: Form adapts properly, input fields visible and usable without horizontal scroll.
Actual Result: Form adapts properly, input fields visible and usable without horizontal scroll, BUT fields don't appear in proper way, it extends outside the screen.

Title: SQL Injection on Login
Steps: 1. Open the Login modal.2. Enter ' OR '1'='1 in the username field and any password.3. Click “Log in.”
Expected result: Login must be rejected. No unauthorized access or SQL error messages should appear.
Actual Result: Login is rejected

Title: Input Validation on Signup (Special Characters)
Steps: 1. Open the Signup modal.2. Enter a username with invalid/special characters.3. Click “Sign up.”
Expected result: System should reject invalid characters or display a validation message. No crash should occur.
Actual Result: System accepted invalid characters

Title: Password Strength Validation
Steps: 1. Open Signup modal.2. Enter a weak password like “1234.”3. Click “Sign up.”
Expected result: A warning or validation message should appear requiring a stronger password.
Actual Result: no warning msg, system accepts weak passwords

Title: Access Control: Protected Pages Without Login
Steps: 1. Try to directly access /cart.html via URL, without adding any item to cart
Expected result: System should redirect to login modal or block access.
Actual Result: System accepts going directly to cart page

Title: HTTPS Enforcement
Steps: 1. Open site using http://www.demoblaze.com.2. Observe if redirection occurs.
Expected result: Website should automatically redirect to https://; no mixed-content warning should appear.
Actual Result: redirects to https successfully

Title: Rate Limiting on Login Attempts
Steps: 1. Attempt to log in multiple times (e.g., 10 times) with wrong passwords from the same IP.2. Observe response.
Expected result: After several failed attempts, system should show CAPTCHA, temporary lock, or “Too many attempts” message.
Actual Result: System allows limitless attempts without showing captcha

Title: Login with invalid credentials
Steps: 1. Open Login modal.2. Enter invalid username and password.3. Click “Log in.”
Expected result: Alert message appears: “User does not exist.”
Actual Result: Alert message appears: “User does not exist.”

Title: Login with empty fields
Steps: 1. Open Login modal.2. Leave username and password blank.3. Click “Log in.”
Expected result: Alert message appears: “Please fill out Username and Password.”
Actual Result: Alert message appears: “Please fill out Username and Password.”

Title: Sign up with existing username
Steps: 1. Open Sign up modal.2. Enter a username that already exists.3. Click “Sign up.”
Expected result: Alert message appears: “This user already exists.”
Actual Result: Alert message appears: “This user already exists.”

Title: Add same item twice to cart
Steps: 1. Log in.2. Add a product to the cart.3. Add the same product again.4. Open Cart page.
Expected result: System either: (a) shows one instance only, or (b) shows both with correct quantity and total price — no crash or duplicate error.
Actual Result: System shows the item twice with correct item numbers

Title: Checkout with empty cart
Steps: 1. Log in.2. Go to Cart page with no products.3. Click “Place Order.”
Expected result: Alert message appears: “Your cart is empty.” or order cannot proceed.
Actual Result: No alert msg appear, and the purchase completes normally

Title: Place order with missing fields
Steps: 1. Add an item to cart.2. Go to “Place Order.”3. Leave one or more fields blank (e.g., Name or Credit Card).4. Click “Purchase.”
Expected result: Alert message appears: “Please fill out all required fields.”
Actual Result: Alert message appears: “Please fill out all required fields.”

Title: Invalid credit card format
Steps: 1. Add item to cart.2. Open “Place Order.”3. Enter invalid credit card number (e.g., letters or too short).4. Click “Purchase.”
Expected result: Alert or validation message appears: “Invalid card number.”
Actual Result: No alert msg appear, and the purchase completes normally
